text: Tomasz Kazimierz Tomczykiewicz (2 March 1961 - 28 November 2015) was a Polish politician. He was elected to the Sejm on September 25, 2005 and again in 2015 for the 8th Sejm. He was also a member of Sejm 2001-2005, Sejm 2005-2007, Sejm 2007-2011. Tomczykiewicz was admitted to a hospital on 25 November 2015 due to a kidney disease. He died three days later in Katowice, Poland at the age of 54. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from kidney disease Category:Disease-related deaths in Poland Category:Polish politicians
title: Tomasz Tomczykiewicz
